languages.text: "Не тешь себя иллюзиями, маленькое создание". {n}Глаза Маражая превращаются в две темно-бирюзовые щели.{/n} "Довольно того, что я принимаю тебя почти на равных, соглашаясь на союз. Ищи себе ручного ксеноса в другом месте".

"Do not entertain any illusions, little creature." {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to two dark turquoise slits.{/n} "It is enough that I am treating you almost as an equal by agreeing to an alliance. Look for a pet xenos elsewhere."
languages.original_text: "Не тешь себя иллюзиями, маленькое создание". {n}Глаза Маражая превращаются в две темно-бирюзовые щели.{/n} "Довольно того, что я принимаю тебя почти на равных, соглашаясь на союз. Ищи себе ручного ксеноса в другом месте".

traits.locale_text: "Do not entertain any illusions, little creature." {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to two dark turquoise slits.{/n} "It is enough that I am treating you almost as an equal by agreeing to an alliance. Look for a pet xenos elsewhere."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "Do not entertain any illusions, little creature." {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to two dark turquoise slits.{/n} "It is enough that I am treating you almost as an equal by agreeing to an alliance. Look for a pet xenos elsewhere."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "Do not entertain any illusions, little creature." {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to two dark turquoise slits.{/n} "It is enough that I am treating you almost as an equal by agreeing to an alliance. Look for a pet xenos elsewhere."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "Do not entertain any illusions, little creature." {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to two dark turquoise slits.{/n} "It is enough that I am treating you almost as an equal by agreeing to an alliance. Look for a pet xenos elsewhere."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: “别抱什么不切实际的幻想，低等生物。”{n}玛拉斋的眼睛眯成了两条青绿色的细缝。{/n}“我同意和你结盟，也愿意几乎把你当成同等生物对待，但到此为止了。如果你打算找异形宠物，还是去别地方找吧。”
languages.original_text: "Do not entertain any illusions, little creature." {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to two dark turquoise slits.{/n} "It is enough that I am treating you almost as an equal by agreeing to an alliance. Look for a pet xenos elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: “别抱什么不切实际的幻想，低等生物。”{n}玛拉斋的眼睛眯成了两条青绿色的细缝。{/n}“我同意和你结盟，也愿意几乎把你当成同等生物对待，但到此为止了。如果你打算找异形宠物，还是去别地方找吧。”
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: « Ne vous faites pas d'illusions, petite créature, {n}rétorque Marazhai en plissant ses yeux turquoise.{/n} Vous avez déjà de la chance que je vous traite quasiment en {mf|égal|égale} en acceptant cette alliance, mais ne comptez pas sur moi pour jouer au xénos domestique. »
languages.original_text: "Do not entertain any illusions, little creature." {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to two dark turquoise slits.{/n} "It is enough that I am treating you almost as an equal by agreeing to an alliance. Look for a pet xenos elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous faites pas d'illusions, petite créature, {n}rétorque Marazhai en plissant ses yeux turquoise.{/n} Vous avez déjà de la chance que je vous traite quasiment en {mf|égal|égale} en acceptant cette alliance, mais ne comptez pas sur moi pour jouer au xénos domestique. »
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: «No te hagas ilusiones, criaturita». {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos, dejando solo dos ranuras de color turquesa.{/n} «Bastante es que te trate como mi igual aceptando aliarme contigo. Si quieres un xenos mascota, búscate a otro».
languages.original_text: "Do not entertain any illusions, little creature." {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to two dark turquoise slits.{/n} "It is enough that I am treating you almost as an equal by agreeing to an alliance. Look for a pet xenos elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: «No te hagas ilusiones, criaturita». {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos, dejando solo dos ranuras de color turquesa.{/n} «Bastante es que te trate como mi igual aceptando aliarme contigo. Si quieres un xenos mascota, búscate a otro».
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: 「幻に興じるのはよしな、ちっぽけな生き物」{n}マラズハイの目は細められ、まるで暗いターコイズ色の切れ目のように見えた。{/n}「同盟に同意した時点で、俺はお前を対等に扱ってやってるんだ。ペットの異種族は他で探すんだな」
languages.original_text: "Do not entertain any illusions, little creature." {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to two dark turquoise slits.{/n} "It is enough that I am treating you almost as an equal by agreeing to an alliance. Look for a pet xenos elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: 「幻に興じるのはよしな、ちっぽけな生き物」{n}マラズハイの目は細められ、まるで暗いターコイズ色の切れ目のように見えた。{/n}「同盟に同意した時点で、俺はお前を対等に扱ってやってるんだ。ペットの異種族は他で探すんだな」
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: "Gebt Euch keinen Illusionen hin, kleine Kreatur." {n}Marazhais Augen verengen sich zu zwei dunklen, türkisen Schlitzen.{/n} "Es reicht schon, dass ich Euch beinahe als ebenbürtig behandle, indem ich einem Bündnis zustimme. Sucht Euch anderswo ein Xenos-Haustier."
languages.original_text: "Do not entertain any illusions, little creature." {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to two dark turquoise slits.{/n} "It is enough that I am treating you almost as an equal by agreeing to an alliance. Look for a pet xenos elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: "Gebt Euch keinen Illusionen hin, kleine Kreatur." {n}Marazhais Augen verengen sich zu zwei dunklen, türkisen Schlitzen.{/n} "Es reicht schon, dass ich Euch beinahe als ebenbürtig behandle, indem ich einem Bündnis zustimme. Sucht Euch anderswo ein Xenos-Haustier."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: "Kendini kandırma küçük yaratık." {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri kısılarak iki koyu turkuaz çizgiye dönüşüyor.{/n} "İttifak kurmayı kabul edip sana eşitmişiz gibi davrandığıma şükret. Evcil bir zeno arıyorsan başka kapıya."
languages.original_text: "Do not entertain any illusions, little creature." {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to two dark turquoise slits.{/n} "It is enough that I am treating you almost as an equal by agreeing to an alliance. Look for a pet xenos elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: "Kendini kandırma küçük yaratık." {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri kısılarak iki koyu turkuaz çizgiye dönüşüyor.{/n} "İttifak kurmayı kabul edip sana eşitmişiz gibi davrandığıma şükret. Evcil bir zeno arıyorsan başka kapıya."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai
